entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
